text: (nabiye! oba mema dharmaya samudiranaya kala avasthavedi) obata savan dena aya (men sitinnan) obagen æt vi pitamam vu vahama, (visvasavantayin vana mema dharma) gnanaya laba denu læbu ayata (samaccalayen “obage nabi vana) ohu, tikakata kalin kumak nam kivehida?”yi vimasannanda ovungen sitinnaha. mevænnange hrdayan mata allah mudra kara hæriyeya. (ebævin) movun tamange (sarira) asavan anugamanaya karamin katayutu karannaha
